scripts.dev: concurrently --names api,fe,db --prefix-colors green,magenta,blue "yarn workspace api start:dev" "yarn workspace fe dev" "docker compose up"
scripts.build: yarn workspace api build && yarn workspace fe build
scripts.test: yarn workspace api test && yarn workspace fe test
scripts.lint: yarn workspace api lint && yarn workspace fe lint
scripts.type-check: yarn workspace api type-check && yarn workspace fe type-check
scripts.clean: rm -rf app/api/dist app/api/logs app/api/node_modules app/fe/dist app/fe/node_modules node_modules .yarn
